name: Bolzico Lettuce Wrap
description: Indulge in a guilt-free, mouthwatering experience with our Bolzico Lettuce Wrap! Perfect for those on a journey to maintaining their health without sacrificing flavor. This high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar recipe is designed to align with your dietary goals while delivering a burst of deliciousness with every bite. Satisfy your cravings healthily with this tantalizing Healthyfied recipe.
recipeIngredient: 10 leaf inner, Lettuce, green leaf, raw

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the Rib Eye Steak across the grain.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the sliced Rib Eye Steak with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a skillet or grilling pan over medium-high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Rib Eye Steak slices in the skillet for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they reach the desired level of doneness. Cooking time: 6 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the lettuce leaves and pat dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Place a portion of the cooked Rib Eye Steak on each lettuce leaf.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Optionally, add your favorite low-carb toppings like sliced avocado or a sprinkle of cheese.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Wrap the lettuce around the filling and enjoy your delicious and healthy Bolzico Lettuce Wrap.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
